metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Basilisk GateOne of the Flaming Fists.Please rename to Fist Nateen.

0.speaker: Fist Nateen
0.text: Once we find out who did that to the Watchers, we'll be knocking some heads together for sure.

1.speaker: Fist Nateen
1.text: These street trash need to watch their tone. I don't tolerate disrespect.
